text.content:
Example career which demonstrates use of macros and styles provided by the MgT2e system. This is not meant to be at all balanced for use as an actual career.

Qualification: [[/mgt2e skill cha=INT target=6 text="Consultant Qualification"]]{INT 6+}

DM-1 for every previous career

Assignments

Choose one of the following:

[[/mgt2e item uuid=Compendium.mgt2e.base-items.Item.qjJYcI4aZT0C1Gs9]]{Military Consultant}: You consult with paramilitary and military organisations, providing training and strategy advice.

[[/mgt2e item uuid=Compendium.mgt2e.base-items.Item.PbeurtRbQvrP0yag]]{Technical Consultant}: You consult with businesses, providing specialist technical services.

[[/mgt2e item uuid=Compendium.mgt2e.base-items.Item.LYPcdUEC7yXpNL3H]]{Business Consultant}: You consult with businesses, providing business advice and strategy.

 SURVIVALADVANCEMENT
Military Consultant[[/mgt2e skill cha="END" target=7 text="Military Consultant Survival check" success="Survive, roll on Events table" failure="Fail. Roll on Mishap table"]]{END 7+}[[/mgt2e skill cha="INT" target=5 text="Military Consultant Advancement check" success="Gain a rank"]]{INT 5+}
Technical Consultant[[/mgt2e skill cha="INT" target=5 text="Technical Consultant Survival check" success="Survive, roll on Events table" failure="Fail. Roll on Mishap table"]]{INT 5+}[[/mgt2e skill cha="EDU" target=7 text="Technical Consultant Advancement check" success="Gain a rank"]]{EDU 7+}
Business Consultant[[/mgt2e skill cha="EDU" target=6 text="Business Consultant Survival check" success="Survive, roll on Events table" failure="Fail. Roll on Mishap table"]]{EDU 6+}[[/mgt2e skill cha="INT" target=6 text="Business Consultant Advancement check" success="Gain a rank"]]{INT 6+}

Mishaps

[[/r 1D6 # Consultant Mishap Table]]MISHAP
1Severely injured (this is the same as a result of 2 on the Injury table). Alternatively, roll twice on the Injury Table and take the lower result.
2You find a way to be creative with your taxes. However, you aren't creative enough and your accountant drops you in it. Gain [[/mgt2e train skill=advocate level=1]]{Advocate 1}. Make an [[/mgt2e skill cha=- skill=deception target=8 text="Deception check to avoid prison" success="You avoid prison" failure="You go to prison"]]{Deception check} to avoid taking the prisoner career next term.
3A project goes badly wrong, and you are blamed. You are ejected from this career. Depending on how you play things, you can extend the problem for as long as possible, doubling Cash benefits from this career and gain [[/mgt2e associate type=rival number=1D3 name="Ex-Associates" description="Someone you took down with you"]]{1D3 Rivals} as you take down others with you. Or, you can raise issues early, losing benefits from this term but gaining [[/mgt2e associate type=ally number=1D3 name="Colleagues" descriptions="Friends who got out as you take the fall"]]{1D3 Allies}
4You learn something you should not know and people want to kill you for it. Gain an [[/mgt2e associate type=enemy name="Enemy" description="They want to silence you"]]{Enemy} and [[/mgt2e train skill=deception level=1 text="Things you shouldn't know"]]{Deception 1}.
5You work means long hours, which leaves no room for any work/life balance. Lose an Ally or Contact and suffer [[/mgt2e train cha=END level=-1]]{END -1} as you suffer a nervous breakdown.
6Injured. Roll on the Injury Table.

 

Events

[[/r 2D6 # Consultant Event Table]]EVENT
2Disaster! Roll on the Mishap table but you are not ejected from this career.
3You are stuck on a long running project away from home. Gain [[/mgt2e train skill=carouse level=1 text="Long running project"]]{Carouse 1} or DM +1 to a benefit roll from this career.
4You take advantage of some extracurricular training. Gain one of the following skills: [[/mgt2e train skill=persuade level=1 text="Extracurricular training"]]{Persuade 1}, [[/mgt2e train skill=leadership level=1 text="Extracurricular training"]]{Leadership 1} or [[/mgt2e train skill=advocate level=1 text="Extracurricular training"]]{Advocate 1}
5You establish a network of contacts at trade shows. Gain [[/mgt2e associate type=contact number=1D3 text="A network of contacts" name="Trade Show Contact" description="Contact met at industry trade shows"]]{1D3 Contacts}
6You are given advanced training in a specialist field. Roll [[/mgt2e skill cha=EDU text="Advanced training in a specialist field" success="Increase any one skill you have by one level"]]{EDU 8+} to increase any one skill you already have by one level.
7Life Event. Roll on the Life Events table.
8You have the opportunity to peform some industrial espionage. Gain [[/mgt2e train skill=investigate text="Industrial espionage"]]{Investigate 1}. Roll [[/mgt2e skill cha=INT target=8 text="Industrial espionage" success="Success!" failure="You are caught"]]{INT 8+}. On success, gain +1 to a benefit roll. On failure, lose a benefit roll from this career and automatically fail promotion.
9You write a book which makes people think you know more than you do. Gain DM+2 to your next advancement roll.
10You are introduced to some expensive new hobbies. Gain one of [[/mgt2e train skill=drive level=1 text="Expensive hobbies"]]{Drive 1}, [[/mgt2e train skill=flyer level=1 text="Expensive hobbies"]]{Flyer 1}, or [[/mgt2e train skill=pilot.smallCraft level=1 text="Expensive hobbies"]]{Pilot (Smallcraft) 1}.
11You befriend the administration staff at a company. You can either gain [[/mgt2e train skill=admin text="Befriend the admins"]]{+1 to Admin} or a +4 to your next survival roll in this career.
12You help found a new company. You are automatically promoted.
